datafield.subfield: Observation of Zb(10610) and Zb(10650) Decaying to B Mesons
First Observation of Doubly Cabibbo-Suppressed Decay of a Charmed Baryon: $\Lambda^{+}_{c} \rightarrow p K^{+} \pi^{-}$
First observation of the decay B$^0\to \psi$(2S)$\pi^0$
Search for the rare decay $D^0\to\gamma\gamma$ at Belle
Inclusive and exclusive measurements of $B$ decays to $\chi_{c1}$ and $\chi_{c2}$ at Belle
Measurement of the decay $B\to D\ell\nu_\ell$ in fully reconstructed events and determination of the Cabibbo-Kobayashi-Maskawa matrix element $|V_{cb}|$
Study of $\mathbf{B^{0}\rightarrow\rho^{+}\rho^{-}}$ decays and implications for the CKM angle $\mathbf{\phi_2}$
Measurement of $D^0 – \bar {D^0}$ mixing and search for CP violation in $D^0 \to K^+ K^−, \pi^+ \pi^−$ decays with the full Belle data set
Search for $B^0 \to \pi^- \tau^+ \nu_\tau$ with hadronic tagging at Belle
First model-independent Dalitz analysis of $B^0 \to DK^{*0}$, $D\to K_S^0\pi^+\pi^-$ decay
Inclusive cross sections for pairs of identified light charged hadrons and for single protons in $e^+e^-$ at $\sqrt{s}=$ 10.58 GeV
Study of $\pi^0$ pair production in single-tag two-photon collisions
Energy scan of the $e^+e^- \to h_b(nP)\pi^+\pi^-$ $(n=1,2)$ cross sections and evidence for $\Upsilon(11020)$ decays into charged bottomonium-like states
Measurement of the branching ratio of $\bar{B} \to D^{(\ast)} \tau^- \bar{\nu}_\tau$ relative to $\bar{B} \to D^{(\ast)} \ell^- \bar{\nu}_\ell$ decays with hadronic tagging at Belle
First observation of the hadronic transition $ \Upsilon(4S) \to \eta h_{b}(1P)$ and new measurement of the $h_b(1P)$ and $\eta_b(1S)$ parameters
Measurement of $e^+e^- \to \gamma\chi_{cJ}$ via initial state radiation at Belle
Measurement of Azimuthal Modulations in the Cross-Section of Di-Pion Pairs in Di-Jet Production from Electron-Positron Annihilation
First Observation of CP Violation in $\overline{B}^0 \to D^{(*)}_{\rm CP} h^0$ Decays by a Combined Time-Dependent Analysis of BABAR and Belle Data
Study of $D^{**}$ production and light hadronic states in the $\bar{B}^0 \to D^{*+} \omega \pi^-$ decay
Search for $B^+ → ℓ^+ν_ℓγ$ decays with hadronic tagging using the full Belle data sample
Measurements of $B\rightarrow \bar{D} D_{s0} ^{*+}(2317)$ decay rates and a search for isospin partners of the $D_{s0}^{*+} (2317)$
Semi-inclusive studies of semileptonic $B_s$ decays at Belle
Measurement of the branching fraction of B^+ -> tau^+ nu_tau decays with the semileptonic tagging method
Search for $B^+ \to e^+ \nu$ and $B^+ \to \mu^+ \nu$ decays using hadronic tagging
Measurement of the amplitude ratio of $B^0 \to D^0K^{*0}$ and $B^0 \to \bar{D^0}K^{*0}$ decays with a model-independent Dalitz plot analysis using $D\to K_S^0\pi^+\pi^-$ decays
Search for the decay $B^+\rightarrow\overline{K}{}^{*0}K^{*+}$ at Belle
Observation of X(3872) in B→X(3872)Kπ decays
Search for B decays to final states with the η$_{c}$ meson
Measurement of the direct $CP$ asymmetry in $\bar{B}\rightarrow X_{s+d}\gamma$ decays with a lepton tag
Measurements of the $\Upsilon$(10860) and $\Upsilon$(11020) resonances via $\sigma(e^+e^-\to \Upsilon(nS)\pi^+ \pi^-)$
